DOC.brief_summary: The investigator wish investigate short term effect low circulate free fatty acid congestive heart failure patient type 2 diabetes . Hypothesis : Low level circulate free fatty acid decrease myocardial peripheral muscle lipid content , improve cardiac performance exercise capacity .
DOC.brief_title: Modulation Free Fatty Acids Heart Failure Patients With Diabetes : `` Effect Left Ventricular Function ''
DOC.criteria: ejection fraction lower 45 % type 2 diabetes know screatinine > 220mM know Salanine aminotransferase > 3 time normal upper limit disabilitating condition pregnancy insulin treatment
